title: Whiplash
lyrics:
You pulled me under the wave
Throwing me up every day
Underwater I'm, losing strength to fight
What are you saying to me
You come and go as you please
Blue eyes, you're dead

Looking through my head



You speak like a bullet

That flies right into me



I feel the whiplash

We always kick back

My heart's on my sleeve

So aim at the knees

I feel the whiplash

We always kick back

So fire when you please

Just shoot and release



Whiplash

I feel the whiplash



You better watch what you say

Pulling me every way

Make a fool of me

Every time you speak

Running away through night

Forever be paralyzed, lies

Dropping to my knees

Push me back to sea



You speak like a bullet

That flies right into me



I feel the whiplash

We always kick back

My heart's on my sleeve

So aim at the knees

I feel the whiplash

We always kick back

So fire when you please

Just shoot and release



Whiplash

I feel the whiplash

I feel the whiplash

I feel the whiplash
